name: Newtraction
description:
Manipulate your orbs in order to achieve a perfect synergy in this space-themed puzzler.

Features

  • Many different levels
  • Endless mode
  • Sandbox mode
  • Custom soundtrack
  • High quality visuals

Help

Newtraction is a puzzler in which the objective is to bring all of your orbs together in a certain amount of time. Modify each orb's gravitational field using your given power, you can even harvest back power from some orbs, and then play out your scenario. Bigger orbs remain fixed and their field cannot be modified.

Controls

W/A/S/D/Q/E - movement

Left click  - select orb

O/P/Scroll - change selected orb's field

R - run your scenario

F - sandbox multi-tool

Made in 4 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
